VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Christine?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Christine is arc {Ryanmouth}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Ryanmouth?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Ryanmouth is arc {Christine}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Martinstad to Ryanmouth in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Martinstad to Jackfort in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Christine and Jackfort in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Christine and Jackfort is {158}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Christine and Ryanmouth in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Christine and Ryanmouth is {110}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Jackfort?
SC.A: The total flow output from Jackfort is {429}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Christine?
SC.A: The total flow input by Christine is {293}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 181? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {190} from {Jackfort} to {Martinstad}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 61? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {56} from {Martinstad} to {Ryanmouth}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 90 and 137? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {135} from {Ryanmouth} to {Christine}, a flow of {110} from {Christine} to {Ryanmouth}, a flow of {100} from {Ryanmouth} to {Jackfort}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Jackfort to Martinstad or from Jackfort to Christine?
NC.A: The flow from {Jackfort} to {Martinstad} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Martinstad to Jackfort, from Christine to Ryanmouth, or from Ryanmouth to Martinstad?
NC.A: The flow from {Martinstad} to {Jackfort} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Ryanmouth}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Jackfort} and {Martinstad}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Christine, Arc Jackfort, Arc Ryanmouth, Arc Martinstad}.
